name: The Holographic Principle
description:
A galaxy merger slinged the planetary system towards the central black hole. Awakened to this threat, colonies are attacking each other in panic. Fend off the assailants, and send a spark of hope beyond gravity's grasp.

The Holographic Principle is a turn based strategy game. Your objective is to build an Escape Ark, which will hopefully carry what's left of humanity to a distant system. Control, defend, exploit habitats to meet your goal.

This game is made for Godot Wild Jam #8.

Release Notes:

  • v1.0.1 (within jam deadline) - Fix typos and add missing project descriptions.

Controls:
Mouse only. Some shortcuts available in battle.
